resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104478</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205860</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">National Museum of African Art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nationales Museum der afrikanischen kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musée national d'art africain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Museu nacional da arte africana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Museo nazionale di arte africana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνικό μουσείο της αφρικανικής τέχνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Museo nacional del arte africano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents images from more than 30 exhibitions -- embroideries, textiles, pottery, jewelry, sculptures, palace doors, chairs, headrests, pipes, cups, drinking horns, bowls, drums, photos, currency, icons, and a range of paintings, including contemporary works.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Bilder von mehr als 30 Ausstellungen -- 
Stickereien, Gewebe, Tonwaren, Schmucksachen, Skulpturen, 
Palasttüren, Stühle, Kopflehnen, Rohre, Cup, trinkende Horne, 
Schüsseln, Trommeln, Fotos, Währung, Ikonen und eine Strecke von den
Anstrichen, einschließlich zeitgenössische Arbeiten dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente des images de plus de 30 expositions -- 
broderies, textiles, poterie, bijoux, sculptures, portes de palais, 
chaises, appuis-tête, pipes, tasses, klaxons potables, cuvettes, 
tambours, photos, devise, graphismes, et un intervalle des peintures, 
y compris les travaux contemporains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta imagens de mais de 30 exhibitions -- 
embroideries, textiles, cerâmica, jóia, sculptures, portas do 
palácio, cadeiras, headrests, tubulações, copos, chifres bebendo, 
bacias, cilindros, fotos, moeda corrente, ícones, e uma escala das 
pinturas, including trabalhos contemporary.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta le immagini da più di 30 mostre -- 
ricami, tessile, terraglie, monili, sculture, portelli del palazzo, 
sedie, poggiacapi, tubi, tazze, corni beventi, ciotole, i tamburi, 
foto, valuta, icone e una gamma delle pitture, compreso gli impianti 
contemporanei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει τις εικόνες από περισσότερες από 30 
εκθέσεις -- κεντητικές, κλωστοϋφαντουργικά προϊόντα, 
αγγειοπλαστική, κόσμημα, γλυπτά, πόρτες παλατιών, καρέκλες, 
headrests, σωλήνες, φλυτζάνια, κέρατα κατανάλωσης, κύπελλα, 
τύμπανα, φωτογραφίες, νόμισμα, εικονίδια, και μια σειρά των 
έργων ζωγραφικής, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των σύγχρονων εργασιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta imágenes de más de 30 exposiciones -- 
bordados, textiles, cerámica, joyería, esculturas, puertas del 
palacio, sillas, apoyos para la cabeza, tubos, tazas, cuernos que 
beben, tazones de fuente, tambores, fotos, modernidad, iconos, y un 
rango de pinturas, incluyendo trabajos contemporáneos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205860</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104478</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/national-museum-of-african-art</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
